About Us

Newsfeed is a newspaper, magazine and blog style template. It is a perfect fit for Blog, Creative Blog, Tech Blog, Lifestyle Blog, Magazine, SEO Blog, News Agencies, Travel & Tour Agencies, Business Magazines, Lifestyle Brands, and Technology News websites. It is also suitable for any kinds of publishing or review websites that require a sleek, modern, and clean look.

Installing and customizing this theme is very easy. All required information are provided in documentation.

Top Freatures of NewsFeed

Here following the top features of that template.

  • Bootstrap 5 framework based template
  • Gulp / SCSS used ( Developer Friendly )
  • Magazine / Newspaper / blog style, highly content focused modern design.
  • 100% reader friendly and content focused
  • Fully responsive for all major devices. Specially optimized for the tablet and mobile devices.
  • W3C validated code and error free coding
  • Image and Text logo both supported
  • Unique Logo for mobile devices
  • Adsense Ready, you can use leaderboard and standard size ads in that template
  • Multiple homepage variation
  • Search UI added
  • Post navgiation included
  • Tooltip feature
  • Author Page, Category Page, Tags Page and optimized blog design
  • News Ticker included at the top of the webpage
  • Exclusive jQuery and CSS3 Effects
  • Multi Level Dropdown Menu supported
  • Megamenu Supported
  • Subscription Form
  • Free google fonts used
  • Free iconic font support
  • Social Media Sharing
  • Long-term Support

Key Features

Here following the key features of that template.

W3C Validated

Markup validation is an important step towards ensuring the technical quality of web pages

High Perfromance

Our coding and file arrangement ensures this theme/ template is ligher and it will loads your site faster

Fully Responsive

All the elements are fully responsive and ready for mobile, tablet or any other devices

Highly Customizable

Create something unique and beautlifyully tailored to your needs in a short time by using that template

Great Support

We have 24/7 dedicated support team to help you instantly for any issues or problem

Well Documented

We provide intuitive and detailed documentation, you will get help directly from us if there anything missing or not understand by you

What do you get?

  • HTML Files
  • CSS Files
  • JS Files
  • Online Documentation

Sources and Credits

  • jQuery
  • Bootstrap 5 ( Mobile first HTML/CSS Framework )
  • Popper JS ( Tooltip & popover positioning engine )
  • Prismjs ( For Syntax Highlight support )
  • Lightbox
  • Gulp ( A toolkit to automate & enhance your workflow )
  • Font Awesome ( For icon support )
  • Unsplash ( For royalty free images )
  • MeanMenu ( Navigation Menu for Mobile )
  • fitvidsjs ( A lightweight, easy-to-use jQuery plugin for fluid width video embeds. )
  • AOS ( Animate on Scroll )
